SELECT mr.roomNO, mr.par1 , mr.par2 , mr.lmcontent , mr.field, mr.memberimg, r.resdate, r.restime, mr.unreadcount1, mr.unreadcount2, mr.roomstatus FROM messageroom mr, reservation r
WHERE (mr.par1 = #{id} and mr.rno= r.rno) OR (mr.par2 = #{id} and mr.rno= r.rno)
ORDER BY r.resdate DESC
SELECT distinct COALESCE( ( SELECT roomno FROM messageroom where (roomno=#{roomno} and par1=#{id}) ), 0 ) AS roomno from messageroom
SELECT distinct COALESCE( ( SELECT roomno FROM messageroom where (roomno=#{roomno} and par2=#{id}) ), 0 ) AS roomno from messageroom
select roomno from messageroom where (par1 = #{par} and par2 = #{id}) or (par1 = #{id} and par2 = #{par})
mapper.update: update messageroom set roomstatus = '승인됨' where roomno = #{roomno}
update messageroom set roomstatus = '진행중' where roomno = #{roomno}
update messageroom set roomstatus = '승인거부' where roomno = #{roomno}
update messageroom set roomstatus = '종료' where roomno = #{roomno}

UPDATE messageroom SET roomstatus = '종료' WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM reservation WHERE reservation.rno = messageroom.rno AND ( reservation.resdate < SYSDATE) OR (reservation.resdate IS NULL AND reservation.restime+1 < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24')))) and roomstatus = '진행중'

UPDATE messageRoom SET roomstatus = '진행중' WHERE roomNo IN ( SELECT mr.roomNo FROM messageRoom mr JOIN reservation r ON mr.rno = r.rno WHERE r.resDate = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND r.resTime = TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'HH24') )and roomstatus='승인됨'

update.if: update messageroom set unreadcount1 = 0 where roomno=#{roomno} and par1 = #{id}
update messageroom set unreadcount2 = 0 where roomno=#{roomno} and par2 = #{id}

mapper.update: update message set acceptdate = sysdate where accepter = #{id} and acceptdate is null
update messageroom set lmcontent = #{lmcontent} where roomno = #{roomno}
